inventorio.settings.player.title: Inventorio (Player Settings)
inventorio.settings.player.scroll_wheel_: Rebind Scroll Wheel to the Utility Belt
inventorio.settings.player.use_item_appl:
Allow the Vanilla "Use Item" to use the Offhand.
Disabled by default due to "Use Utility" button.
Not mutually exclusive with "Use Utility" keybinding.
inventorio.settings.player.swapped_hands:
Assign the Hotbar to the Offhand,
and the Utility Belt to the Main Hand.

Assign the Hotbar to the Offhand,
and the Utility Belt to the Main Hand.
§cCurrently disabled by Global Settings!
inventorio.settings.global.title: Inventorio (Global Settings)
inventorio.settings.global.description:
§fChanging these settings will have a game-wide effect.
The intended use is mod compatibility.
Joining a modded server may override these settings.
§cIt's strongly recommended to restart Minecraft after changing these settings.
inventorio.settings.global.disabled_by_s: §cCan't set Global Settings while playing on a server.
inventorio.settings.global.totem_from_ut: Totem Activates from the Utility Belt
inventorio.settings.global.integrations:
§fHacky Mod Integrations
§7While we wait for these mods to implement necessary changes properly, this mod includes hacky injects to fix compatibility issues for the time being.
Has no effect for non-installed mods.
inventorio.settings.global.sync_restart_:
§eWarning!
§eThis server uses different global settings than you do:§7
%s
§7It's strongly recommended to sync your global settings and restart the game.
§cNot restarting the game will cause bugs!
